update search set Product = #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Category = #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCMainTitle = #{pcmaintitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCSubTitle = #{pcsubtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AppMainTitle = #{appmaintitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AppSubTitle = #{appsubtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Properties = #{properties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ScenicSpots = #{scenicspots,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Themes = #{themes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fiter_themes = #{fiterThemes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GeoHash = #{geohash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProvinceAlias = #{provincealias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, City = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CityAlias = #{cityalias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, District = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, RetailPrice = #{retailprice,jdbcType=REAL}, PCImageUrl = #{pcimageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AppImageUrl = #{appimageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ChannelLinkId = #{channellinkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SalesVolume = #{salesvolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Grade = #{grade,jdbcType=REAL}, Rank = #{rank,jdbcType=REAL}, CreatedDate = #{createddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sync_time = #{syncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CommentCount = #{commentcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_reduce = #{isReduce,jdbcType=BIT}, is_orderd = #{isOrderd,jdbcType=BIT}, couponed_ios = #{couponedIos,jdbcType=BIT}, couponed_android = #{couponedAndroid,jdbcType=BIT}, product_city_alias = #{productCityAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT Id,ProvinceAlias,CityAlias,Product,category_name,Address,PCMainTitle,PCSubTitle,AppMainTitle,AppSubTitle,Tags,Properties, ScenicSpots,Themes,Region,Price,RetailPrice,PCImageUrl,AppImageUrl,ChannelLinkId,SalesVolume,Grade,Rank,CommentCount FROM search WHERE ProvinceAlias = #{provincealias,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY ProvinceAlias,CityAlias,Product ORDER BY CONVERT(ProvinceAlias USING gbk) COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci,CONVERT(CityAlias USING gbk) COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci

SELECT Id,ProvinceAlias,CityAlias,Product,category_name,Address,PCMainTitle,PCSubTitle,AppMainTitle,AppSubTitle,Tags,Properties, ScenicSpots,Themes,Region,Price,RetailPrice,PCImageUrl,AppImageUrl,ChannelLinkId,SalesVolume,Grade,Rank,CommentCount FROM search WHERE CityAlias = #{cityalias,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY ProvinceAlias,CityAlias,Product ORDER BY CONVERT(ProvinceAlias USING gbk) COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci,CONVERT(CityAlias USING gbk) COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci
SELECT COUNT(Product) productNum FROM search WHERE ProvinceAlias = #{provincealias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT COUNT(Product) productNum FROM search WHERE CityAlias = #{cityalias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
